[quote=“Iamadam, post:16, topic:16352”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=24456.msg278255#msg278255 date=1159543724]
PSB takes more time than it should to load, but that’s an easy fix.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 29, 2006, 04:28:28 AM[/size][hr]It’s slower, but it’s faster? Lol?
[/quote]
Will slow down the code’s execution because it has to open files and stuff =]. But it would have been faster to code (rather than writing a huge switch).[/quote]

all you need to do is to get the serverlist.ws and comare the world number to the link and then you have your world prefix

Well done though =]

item.title: Runescape Loader
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

thanks for feedback

for being nice ill let everyone in on a seecret
:o

public void findParams() { System.out.println("Finding The Params For That World.... Please Wait..."); try{ URL url = new URL("http://"+prefix+".runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/game.ws?lowmem=0&plugin=0"); BufferedReader files = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(url.openConnection().getInputStream())); String temp = ""; while((temp = files.readLine()) != null) { if(temp.contains("archive")){ archive = temp.substring(temp.indexOf("archive=") + 8, temp.indexOf(".jar") + 4); } if(temp.contains("worldid")){ worldid = temp.substring(temp.indexOf("worldid value=") + 14, temp.indexOf(">")); } if(temp.contains("modewhat")){ modewhat = temp.substring(temp.indexOf("modewhat value=") + 15, temp.indexOf(">")); } if(temp.contains("modewhere")){ modewhere = temp.substring(temp.indexOf("modewhere value=") + 16, temp.indexOf(">")); } if(temp.contains("lowmem")){ lowmem = temp.substring(temp.indexOf("lowmem value=") + 13, temp.indexOf(">")); if(lowmem.contains("lowmem=1")) lowmem = "1"; else lowmem = "0"; } if(temp.contains("members")){ members = temp.substring(temp.indexOf("members value=") + 14, temp.indexOf(">")); } } System.out.println("height=503\nwidth=765\narchive=" + archive + "\nworldid=" + worldid + "\nmembers=" + members + "\nmodewhat=" + modewhat + "\nmodewhere=" + modewhere + "\nlowmem=" + lowmem + "\nlang=0"); }catch(Exception e){ System.exit(2); System.out.println("Error Finding Params"); } }

<3

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Loader
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[code]import java.io.;
import java.net.;
import java.awt.;
import java.applet.;
import javax.swing.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.util.Properties;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;

public class Load implements AppletStub {

private static Properties params = new Properties();
private static JFrame frame;
private static JPanel game;
public static int worldid;
public static String servernum;
public static String prefix;
public static int uid;
public Color colour;
private Robot AI;
private static Applet app;
private static String client = "loader";
	

public static void main(String[] args)
{
	new Load();
}

public Load()
{
try{
getuid();
String servers = JOptionPane.showInputDialog("Enter The world Number:");
chooseWorld(servers);
System.out.println("Conneting to World - "+worldid+" ("+prefix+")");
System.out.println("Found Your UID Number - " + uid);
URLClassLoader loader = new URLClassLoader(new URL[] { new URL("http://"+prefix+".runescape.com/loader.jar") });
  	Class c = loader.loadClass (client);
  	app = (Applet)c.newInstance();
  	app.setStub(this);
  	loadGUI();
app.init();
app.start(); 
  	   
	}catch(Exception e){}
}
   
   public URL getCodeBase()
	{
    	try{
      	  return new URL("http://"+prefix+".runescape.com");
    	}
    	catch(Exception e){
        	return null;
    	}
	}
	
	public URL getDocumentBase()
	{
  	 	try{
  	 	return new URL("http://"+prefix+".runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/");
  	 	}
  	 	catch(Exception e){
        	return null;
    	}
	}

public String getParameter(String name) {
		params.setProperty("height","503");
		params.setProperty("width","765");
  		params.setProperty("worldid", servernum);
            params.setProperty("members", "0");
            params.setProperty("modewhat", "0");
            params.setProperty("modewhere", "0");
            params.setProperty("lowmem", "1");
            params.setProperty("lang", "0");
    return params.getProperty(name);
}

public AppletContext getAppletContext() {
    return null;
}

public void appletResize(int i, int i1) { }

 public boolean isActive() { return false; }
 
 public void loadGUI()
 { 
	frame = new JFrame("Runescape Applet -  Connected to "+worldid+"("+prefix+") - UID = " + uid);
  	frame.setResizable(false);
  	game = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
  	game.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503)); 
  	game.add(app);
  	frame.getContentPane().add(game, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
frame.pack();
frame.setVisible(true);
 }

 public static void chooseWorld(String server)
 {
 try{ 
 	servernum = server;
worldid = Integer.parseInt(server); 
     switch (worldid) 
     { 
  case 1: Load.prefix = "ul7"; break; 
  case 2: Load.prefix = "ul8"; break; 
  case 3: Load.prefix = "po3"; break; 
  case 4: Load.prefix = "po4"; break; 
  case 5: Load.prefix = "po5"; break; 
  case 6: Load.prefix = "po6"; break; 
  case 7: Load.prefix = "above2"; break; 
  case 8: Load.prefix = "above3"; break; 
  case 9: Load.prefix = "above4"; break; 
  case 10: Load.prefix = "jolt7"; break; 
  case 11: Load.prefix = "jolt8"; break; 
  case 12: Load.prefix = "jolt9"; break; 
  case 13: Load.prefix = "nl3"; break; 
  case 14: Load.prefix = "nl4"; break; 
  case 15: Load.prefix = "uk2"; break; 
  case 16: Load.prefix = "uk3"; break; 
  case 17: Load.prefix = "tor1"; break; 
  case 18: Load.prefix = "tor2"; break; 
  case 19: Load.prefix = "nl7"; break; 
  case 20: Load.prefix = "nl8"; break; 
  case 21: Load.prefix = "nl11"; break; 
  case 22: Load.prefix = "nl1"; break; 
  case 23: Load.prefix = "uk4"; break; 
  case 24: Load.prefix = "uk5"; break; 
  case 25: Load.prefix = "nl12"; break; 
  case 26: Load.prefix = "ul5"; break; 
  case 27: Load.prefix = "nl5"; break; 
  case 28: Load.prefix = "nl6"; break; 
  case 29: Load.prefix = "ul6"; break; 
  case 30: Load.prefix = "po7"; break; 
  case 31: Load.prefix = "po8"; break; 
  case 32: Load.prefix = "ul1"; break; 
  case 33: Load.prefix = "at1"; break; 
  case 34: Load.prefix = "at2"; break; 
  case 35: Load.prefix = "at3"; break; 
  case 36: Load.prefix = "at4"; break; 
  case 37: Load.prefix = "tor3"; break; 
  case 38: Load.prefix = "planet1"; break; 
  case 39: Load.prefix = "planet2"; break; 
  case 40: Load.prefix = "planet3"; break; 
  case 41: Load.prefix = "planet4"; break; 
  case 42: Load.prefix = "po2"; break; 
  case 43: Load.prefix = "sl11"; break; 
  case 44: Load.prefix = "at6"; break; 
  case 45: Load.prefix = "planet5"; break; 
  case 46: Load.prefix = "planet6"; break; 
  case 47: Load.prefix = "above5"; break; 
  case 48: Load.prefix = "above6"; break; 
  case 49: Load.prefix = "ams1"; break; 
  case 50: Load.prefix = "ams2"; break; 
  case 51: Load.prefix = "ams3"; break; 
  case 52: Load.prefix = "ams4"; break; 
  case 53: Load.prefix = "ams5"; break; 
  case 54: Load.prefix = "ams6"; break; 
  case 55: Load.prefix = "ch1"; break; 
  case 56: Load.prefix = "nl10"; break; 
  case 57: Load.prefix = "ch3"; break; 
  case 58: Load.prefix = "ch4"; break; 
  case 59: Load.prefix = "ch5"; break; 
  case 60: Load.prefix = "ch6"; break; 
  case 61: Load.prefix = "se1"; break; 
  case 62: Load.prefix = "se2"; break; 
  case 63: Load.prefix = "se3"; break; 
  case 64: Load.prefix = "se4"; break; 
  case 65: Load.prefix = "se5"; break; 
  case 66: Load.prefix = "se6"; break; 
  case 67: Load.prefix = "jolt10"; break; 
  case 68: Load.prefix = "jolt11"; break; 
  case 69: Load.prefix = "jolt12"; break; 
  case 70: Load.prefix = "sl10"; break; 
  case 71: Load.prefix = "uk7"; break; 
  case 72: Load.prefix = "sl1"; break; 
  case 73: Load.prefix = "sl2"; break; 
  case 74: Load.prefix = "sl3"; break; 
  case 75: Load.prefix = "sl4"; break; 
  case 76: Load.prefix = "sl5"; break; 
  case 77: Load.prefix = "sl6"; break; 
  case 78: Load.prefix = "sl7"; break; 
  case 79: Load.prefix = "sl8"; break; 
  case 80: Load.prefix = "jolt1"; break; 
  case 81: Load.prefix = "jolt2"; break; 
  case 82: Load.prefix = "jolt3"; break; 
  case 83: Load.prefix = "jolt4"; break; 
  case 84: Load.prefix = "jolt5"; break; 
  case 85: Load.prefix = "ny1"; break; 
  case 86: Load.prefix = "ny2"; break; 
  case 87: Load.prefix = "ny4"; break; 
  case 88: Load.prefix = "ny5"; break; 
  case 89: Load.prefix = "ny6"; break; 
  case 90: Load.prefix = "ny7"; break; 
  case 91: Load.prefix = "ny8"; break; 
  case 92: Load.prefix = "nl9"; break; 
  case 93: Load.prefix = "mi1"; break; 
  case 94: Load.prefix = "mi2"; break; 
  case 95: Load.prefix = "mi3"; break; 
  case 96: Load.prefix = "mi4"; break; 
  case 97: Load.prefix = "mi5"; break; 
  case 98: Load.prefix = "mi6"; break; 
  case 99: Load.prefix = "mi7"; break; 
  case 100: Load.prefix = "ul3"; break; 
  case 101: Load.prefix = "at7"; break; 
  case 102: Load.prefix = "at8"; break; 
  case 103: Load.prefix = "at9"; break; 
  case 104: Load.prefix = "at10"; break; 
  case 105: Load.prefix = "uk8"; break; 
  case 106: Load.prefix = "uk9"; break; 
  case 107: Load.prefix = "au1"; break; 
  case 108: Load.prefix = "au2"; break; 
  case 109: Load.prefix = "au3"; break; 
  case 110: Load.prefix = "au4"; break; 
  case 111: Load.prefix = "au5"; break; 
  case 112: Load.prefix = "au6"; break; 
  case 113: Load.prefix = "tor4"; break; 
  case 114: Load.prefix = "tor5"; break; 
  case 115: Load.prefix = "tor6"; break; 
  case 116: Load.prefix = "tor7"; break; 
  case 117: Load.prefix = "swe1"; break; 
  case 118: Load.prefix = "swe2"; break; 
  case 119: Load.prefix = "swe3"; break; 
  case 120: Load.prefix = "swe4"; break; 
  case 121: Load.prefix = "swe5"; break; 
  case 122: Load.prefix = "swe6"; break; 
  case 123: Load.prefix = "swe7"; break; 
  case 124: Load.prefix = "swe8"; break; 
  case 125: Load.prefix = "va1"; break; 
  case 126: Load.prefix = "va2"; break; 
  case 127: Load.prefix = "va3"; break; 
  case 128: Load.prefix = "va4"; break; 
  case 129: Load.prefix = "va5"; break; 
  case 130: Load.prefix = "va6"; break; 
  case 131: Load.prefix = "va7"; break; 
  case 132: Load.prefix = "va8"; break;       
  default: Load.prefix = "ams1"; System.out.println("Invalid Server Number (1-132)\nSet To Default Server: World 49(ams1)\n\n"); worldid = 49; break;
  		} 
      } 
      catch (Exception exception) 
      { 
         System.out.println("ERROR: Please give a valid world number (1 To 132)"); 
              System.exit(2); 
      } 
}

public static final int getuid() {
try {
File file = new File(“C:/WINDOWS/.file_store_32/uid.dat”);
if (!file.exists() || file.length() < 4L) {
DataOutputStream dataoutputstream = new DataOutputStream(
new FileOutputStream(“C:/WINDOWS/.file_store_32/uid.dat”));
dataoutputstream.writeInt((int) (Math.random() * 99999999D));
dataoutputstream.close();
}
} catch (Exception _ex) {
}
try {
DataInputStream datainputstream = new DataInputStream(
new FileInputStream(“C:/WINDOWS/.file_store_32/uid.dat”));
int i = datainputstream.readInt();
datainputstream.close();
uid = i + 1;
return i + 1;
} catch (Exception _ex) {
return 0;
}
}
}[/code]
